charts.name: 每秒缓冲池内存读写请求
每秒 SQL 执行次数

query.q: M::`mysql`:(fill(AVG(`Open_tables`), linear) AS `打开表数`) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `host`

charts.name: 每秒自动创建的临时表数
每秒缓冲池磁盘读请求

settings.tableSortMetricName: 当前正在等待锁的数量

query.alias: 当前正在等待锁的数量
query.q: NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`mysql_innodb`:(fill(AVG(`lock_row_lock_current_waits`), linear) AS `当前正在等待锁的数量`) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `host`")

eval(A/(B+0.0001), alias='等待锁平均耗时', A="NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(\"M::`mysql_innodb`:(fill(AVG(`lock_row_lock_time`), linear)) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `host`\")", B="NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(\"M::`mysql_innodb`:(fill(AVG(`lock_row_lock_waits`), linear)) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `host`\")")
NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`mysql_innodb`:(fill(AVG(`lock_row_lock_time_max`), linear) AS `等待锁最大耗时`) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `host`")

settings.tableSortMetricName: 不能立即获得锁的数量

query.alias: 不能立即获得锁的数量
query.q: NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`mysql`:(fill(AVG(`Table_locks_waited`), linear) AS `不能立即获得锁的数量`) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `host`")
NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`mysql`:(fill(AVG(`Table_locks_immediate`), linear) AS `立即获得锁的数量`) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `host`")
M::`mysql`:(AVG(`Threads_connected`) AS `当前打开的连接数`) { `host` = '#{host}' }

eval(A+B, alias='每秒事务数', A="NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(\"M::`mysql`:(AVG(`Handler_commit`)) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `host`\")", B="NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(\"M::`mysql`:(AVG(`Handler_rollback`)) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `host`\")")

settings.tableSortMetricName: 尝试与服务器连接导致

query.alias: 尝试连接到服务器失败的次数
query.q: NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`mysql`:(fill(AVG(`Aborted_connects`), linear) AS `尝试连接到服务器失败的次数`) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `host`")

query.alias: 由于客户端没有正确关闭连接而中止的连接数
query.q: NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`mysql`:(fill(AVG(`Aborted_clients`), linear) AS `由于客户端没有正确关闭连接而中止的连接数`) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `host`")

charts.name: MySQL 活动用户信息列表
当前活动用户 Connections 分布
当前活动用户慢查询分布

query.content:
使用这个仪表板，您可以获得连接数、QPS、TPS、吞吐量、异常连接数、每秒无索引join 查询次数、Schema 大小、慢查询、行锁等待时长、活动用户信息、缓冲情况、锁信息等。

了解更多关于MySQL集成的信息：
[我们的官方集成文档](https://docs.guance.com/integrations/datastorage/mysql/)
[监控MySQL性能指标](https://docs.guance.com/datakit/mysql/#measurement)
